com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage

Interface BaseTransaction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BaseTransactionConfigurable, LoggableTransaction, StoreTransaction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractStoreTransaction, BackendTransaction, CacheTransaction, DefaultTransaction, ExpectedValueCheckingTransaction, IndexTransaction, NoOpStoreTransaction

    public interface BaseTransaction
    Represents a transaction for a particular storage backend.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void commit()
      Commits the transaction and persists all modifications to the backend.
      void rollback()
      Aborts (or rolls back) the transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        void commit()
            throws BackendException
        Commits the transaction and persists all modifications to the backend. Call either this method or rollback() at most once per instance.
        Throws:
        BackendException

      • rollback

        void rollback()
              throws BackendException
        Aborts (or rolls back) the transaction. Call either this method or commit() at most once per instance.
        Throws:
        BackendException
